items.content_html: Bring your code examples to life with the Magic Motion! This lightweight and customizable library allows you to effortlessly add stunning animations to your code snippets in React applications. Perfect for documentation, tutorials, or any project where you want to showcase code in a visually appealing manner.
items.title: illia-stv/magic-motion: Bring your code examples to life with the Magic Motion! This lightweight and customizable library allows you to effortlessly add stunning animations to your code snippets in React applications. Perfect for documentation, tutorials, or any project where you want to showcase code in a visually appealing manner.

items.content_html: Rivulex is a lightweight, efficient message broker library written in pure JavaScript. It ensures at-least-once delivery guarantees over Redis Streams.

items.content_html: TinyPath is a lightweight and efficient URL shortener that transforms long web addresses into compact, easy-to-share links. With a clean and intuitive interface, TinyPath allows users to generate shortened URLs quickly, track link performance, and manage their links effortlessly.
items.title: ennypitan/TinyPath: TinyPath is a lightweight and efficient URL shortener that transforms long web addresses into compact, easy-to-share links. With a clean and intuitive interface, TinyPath allows users to generate shortened URLs quickly, track link performance, and manage their links effortlessly.

items.content_html: Vanilla Calendar is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript framework or library. It is designed to be lightweight, simple to use, and feature-rich without relying on external dependencies.
items.title: uvarov-frontend/vanilla-calendar-pro: Vanilla Calendar is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript framework or library. It is designed to be lightweight, simple to use, and feature-rich without relying on external dependencies.
